author: arj
msg: WikiContext.getName() provides a "safer" shortcut than calling WikiContext.getPage().getName() because not all wiki contexts apply to pages. This change was made to: TableOfContents plugin; most of the top-level JSPs; TranslatorReader; PageNameTag.

author: arj
msg: PermissionTag gains three new permission checks: "viewGroup", "editGroup", "deleteGroup".

author: arj
msg: Bug fix: closed <span> tag in InsertPagePlugin.

author: arj
msg: New Groups plugin prints a sorted list of the wiki groups in the group database; generates a hyperlink to each group page.

author: arj
msg: JSPWikiInstaller (Install.jsp) receives a makeover and substantial enhancements to support the new group scheme. When the wiki is set up, we now create an administrative user and an Admin group. It also uses the default CSS.
